comments.raw_text:
Looks like we need to remove "on 10.4" from the comment.
On 10.6 this patches turns menulists, buttons and searchfields upside down.

The intention was virtuous, though :)
comments.author: mstange.moz@gmail.com

comments.text: I don't think so, except if you want to argue that passing nil to the inView: argument is a bug in our code.
